definition[0]: to make air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty and not suitable for people to use
example[1]: The factory pollutes the air and water.
example[2]: The island has been seriously polluted by a copper mine.
example[3]: The rivers had been polluted with aluminium.
definition[1]: to spoil or ruin something that used to be good
example[4]: an artist spiritually polluted by money and fame
